  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Solutions Architect",
  "description": "IT Horizons Limited is a company with diverse talents and skills in existing, recent and upcoming technologies worldwide. We are a team of young, vibrant, ambitious, but experienced professionals who deal with everything relating to technologies, especially information and communication technologies (ICT).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Solutions Architect
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja

Responsibilities


	You will be responsible for scoping, designing, and developing Bill of Materials with pricing for solutions relating to Networks &amp; Collaboration Solution and Intelligent Building Management System.
	You will architect for other areas of solution as the company deem fit from time to time.
	Your goal is to win the customer with innovative solutions that solve customers&rsquo; problems at a price points that gives competitive edge without compromising quality and integrity.
	You will interface with external vendors, OEM, and sales team in ensuring optimum performance of the solution areas under your portfolio.
	You will guide the company on technological trends on areas you manage from time to time.
	You will be responsible for achieving the financial target of the business for the area of solutions you manage.
	The performance of the solutions will be evaluated from time to time as deemed fit by the organization.
	You will be part of a team that is responsible for designing and developing scalable solutions that is in line with customer requirement.
	Speaking with customers via email, phone, physical meetings for initial requirement capture
	Strong knowledge of Compute, Backup/DR, System and Microsoft Solutions.
	Knowledge of Network, Wireless, Collaboration, and Security Solutions.
	Maintain strong relationships with OEMs, in-market field sellers, partner under your area of concentration.
	Keep up to date with various OEM product announcements and sales incentives and programs under your area of coverage.
	Support sales team, prioritizing effort based on maximizing total impact on team productivity and profit, or as directed by Presales Lead or Sales Lead.
	Proactively scopes the technical solution required to address customer requirements, assesses customers met and unmet needs, and recommends solutions that optimize value for both the customer and the organization
	Coordinates closely with internal sales, sales support, and service resources to align solution design with customers&rsquo; business requirements
	Meets assigned targets for profitable sales growth in assigned product lines, market areas, channel, or teams supported
	Opportunistically pursues additional business development opportunities within clients. Collaborates with sales to ensure these opportunities are effectively covered and advanced
	Maintains high customer satisfaction ratings that meet company standards
	Completes required training and development objectives within the assigned time frame
	Builds relationships especially on C-level with customers and global partners that result in superior solutions and deeper loyalty and adoption of ITH&rsquo;s solutions.
	Develop and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders to ensure optimal performance.
	Establishing the customer environment by designing system configuration, directing system installation, defining, documenting and enforcing system standards
	Design and implementation of new solutions and improving resilience of the current environment
	Maximizing network performance by monitoring performance, troubleshooting network problems and outages, scheduling upgrades and collaborating with network architects on network optimization
	Updating job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities, reading professional publications, maintaining personal networks and participating in professional organizations
	Deliver Proof of Concepts (POC)
	Product presentations and demonstrations
	Support with technical qualification of sales opportunities
	Collaborates with sales, service, engineering, and technical support resources to ensure proposed deals include technical solutions that accurately address customer needs and are appropriately supported by key customer technical decision-makers.
	Provide answers to (technical) questions in a Request for Information (RFI) or a Request for Proposal (RFP).


Requirements


	University degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or other related courses or numerate disciplines.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience.
	MSc will be an added Advantage
	Virtualization Certificate (VMware/Microsoft/Nutanix/RedHat), Storage Certificate (DellEMC/IBM/NETAPP), Server Certificate (DellEMC/IBM/HPE), Cloud Certificate (AWS/Azure/Oracle/Google), Backup Solution Certificate (CommVault/Veeam/Quest/IBM/DellEMC/Symantec/Veritas), Network Certificate (Cisco/Fortinet/Brocade), ITIL
	Good at organizing and multitasking and prioritize under pressure
	Able to explain technical problems in a simple term
	Work well with people and Willingness to travel
	In depth knowledge of the compute solution (server, storage, virtualization, cloud, backup, disaster recovery, converge/hyperconverge system, Microsoft solutions)
	Analytical and problem-solving ability.
	Teamwork skills and the ability to feel comfortable working with different teams, clients and groups of staff across an organization.
	Organizational skills and the ability to prioritize your workload.
	Proven hands-on experience on compute system projects
	VCP/MSCE/ITIL/NPP
	Hands-on experience with monitoring, compute system diagnostic and compute system analytics tools


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@ithorizonsgroup.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Job Location: Abuja

Accountant Job at Western Buckland Limited




        
    

        
        Western Buckland Limited, a Telecommunications company, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Accountant with 4-5years of hands-on experience in financial reporting, bookkeeping, and general accounting practices.
	The ideal candidate must be capable of working independently, handling monthly reports, and supporting audits and tax filings in a structured work environment.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Maintain accurate financial records and ensure proper documentation
	Process and verify vendor invoices
	Match invoices with purchase orders and deliveries
	Handle timely payments for all business transactions
	Maintain accurate records and vendor details
	Reconcile bank statements and resolve discrepancies
	Review and audit employees’ expenses
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual management reports
	Manage accounts payable/receivable and reconciliation of statements
	Assist in budgeting, forecasting, and cost control
	Comply with relevant statutory requirements and standards Liaise with external auditors and tax consultants on audit related matters


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	4-5 years of practical accounting experience in a structured organization
	Must be conversant with Microsoft business dynamics and other accounting software’ as added required skills
	Strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel
	Knowledge of taxation.
	Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills, interpersonal skills, adaptability, and customer orientation to work with a variety of stakeholders.
	Good understanding of Nigerian tax laws and statutory reporting
	ICAN/ACCA in progress is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: conuoha@westernbuckland.com and copy recruitments@westernbuckland.com  using the Job Position “Accountant” as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Procurement Officer Job at Rainoil Limited




        
    

        
        Rainoil Limited is a dynamic energy company recognised for safe and sustainable operations across the downstream sector of the oil and gas industry.

Specializing in the bulk storage, retail and distribution of petroleum products, our facilities include 3 ultra-modern bulk storage terminals in Lagos, Delta and Cross River State, over 190 retail stations and a fleet of over 400 distribution trucks. Established with a commitment to delivering high-quality fuel and energy solutions in Nigeria, Rainoil has grown to become a trusted name in the industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Summary


	The Procurement Officer is responsible for sourcing and purchasing goods and services essential to the organization’s operations. This includes evaluating suppliers, negotiating contracts, and ensuring cost-effective procurement in line with quality and delivery standards.


Responsibilities


	Source and procure goods and services in line with company policies and budget.
	Evaluate and monitor supplier performance to ensure compliance with contractual obligations.
	Negotiate price, terms, and conditions of purchase agreements with vendors.
	Liaise with internal departments to understand procurement needs and specifications.
	Ensure compliance with legal and regulatory requirements in procurement activities.
	Assist in the development and implementation of procurement strategies.
	Prepare and process purchase orders and ensure timely delivery of goods and services.
	Maintain accurate records of purchases, pricing, and inventory.
	Monitor stock levels and place orders as needed.
	Conduct market research to identify pricing trends and new suppliers.


Requirements


	Minimum of second class upper bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Proven experience as a Procurement Officer or in a similar role.
	Strong negotiation and communication skills.
	Knowledge of procurement software and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Good analytical and strategic thinking abilities.
	Familiarity with sourcing and vendor management.
